snippet: Katharine Q. Seelye reports from New Hampshire on the role of independent voters in New Hampshire, who can participate in the Republican primary on Tuesday.
abstract: Katharine Q. Seelye reports from New Hampshire on the role of independent voters in New Hampshire, who can participate in the Republican primary on Tuesday.
